Hero.title: THE BEST AND SAFEST ANESTHETICS FOR TATTOOS AND PMU
Hero.headline: FEEL THE POWER OF NO PAIN
Hero.subtitle: LIDOCAINE NUMBING CREAM DESIGNED FOR TATTOOS, WAXING, LASER TREATMENTS AND MORE.

About.intro: At No Pain we develop advanced topical anesthesia formulas specially designed for the tattoo process. Our creams contain a high concentration of anesthetic agents that block nerve stimuli and partially or completely reduce skin sensitivity.
About.result1: Less pain and discomfort during tattoo and permanent makeup sessions.
About.result2: No interference with the skin's natural healing process.
About.result3: Absolute respect for pigment tone and fixation.
About.closing: Thanks to state-of-the-art technology, we offer a more comfortable, safe, and professional tattoo experience without compromising artistic quality or the final result on your skin.

products.title: OUR PRODUCTS
products.noPainNumbingCreamTagline: Topical anesthetic cream for tattoos and PMU. Designed to reduce pain without affecting healing or pigment retention.
products.noPainNumbingCreamDescription: Anesthetic cream for use before tattooing. Reduces pain without interfering with healing or pigments.
products.feature1: Significantly reduces pain during the session.
products.feature2: Does not interfere with the skin's natural healing.
products.feature3: Respects pigment retention and color tone.
products.feature4: Safe and effective for tattoos and PMU.
products.noPainNumbingCreamUsage1: Apply a thick layer 20 minutes before the procedure.
products.noPainNumbingCreamUsage2: Cover with plastic film for greater effectiveness.
products.noPainNumbingCreamUsage3: Remove the excess before starting the tattoo session.
products.noPainNumbingCreamUsage4: Avoid contact with eyes and mucous membranes.
products.noPainNumbingCreamTip1: Store in a cool, dry place.
products.noPainNumbingCreamTip3: Test on a small area before full application.
products.xteriNumbTagline: Disinfectant and anesthetic spray for use during tattooing.
products.xteriNumbDescription: Xteri-Numb is a spray designed for application during a tattoo session. It helps keep the area clean, disinfected, and with reduced pain sensitivity.
products.xteriBenefit4: Does not affect pigments or healing
products.xteriUsage2: Spray onto the tattooed skin as needed.
products.xteriUsage3: Do not rinse, let it act immediately.
products.xteriUsage4: Avoid contact with eyes and mucous membranes.
products.xteriTip1: Keep in a cool, dry place.
products.xteriTip3: Do not apply to open wounds.
products.wicannTagline: Soothing and regenerative tonic for post-tattoo care.
products.wicannDescription: Wicann is a tonic formulated with natural extracts that help reduce irritation and promote skin regeneration after a tattoo. Ideal for quick and safe recovery.
products.wicannBenefit1: Hydrates and soothes freshly tattooed skin
products.wicannUsage1: Clean the tattooed area with Green Soap.
products.wicannUsage2: Apply Wicann directly to the skin.
products.wicannUsage4: Repeat 2-3 times a day as needed.
products.wicannTip2: Keep in a cool, dry place.
products.wicannTip3: Avoid contact with eyes and mucous membranes.
products.greenSoapDescription: Our Green Soap with 4% chlorhexidine gluconate is formulated to provide deep and safe cleaning. Ideal for skin disinfection, wound hygiene, and cleaning contaminated areas.
products.greenSoapBenefit3: Safe and effective for skin care
products.greenSoapAdditional: A reliable solution for preparation, disinfection, and care in procedures requiring maximum hygiene.
products.greenSoapUsage1: Dilute 1 part soap with 9 parts filtered or distilled water.
products.greenSoapUsage2: Apply with a spray bottle or clean cloth to the skin.
products.greenSoapUsage3: Use during and after tattooing for cleaning.
products.greenSoapUsage4: Store in a clean, sealed container.
products.greenSoapTip1: Always use diluted to avoid irritation.
products.greenSoapTip3: Keep out of reach of children.
products.greenSoapTip4: Ideal for cleaning equipment and surfaces as well.

Gallery.title: GALLERY
Gallery.description: Discover the studios, tattoo artists, and experiences with No Pain Brand.
Gallery.usage1: Application of No Pain in tattoo studio, Mexico City
Gallery.usage2: Clinical use of Xteri-Numb in Barcelona
Gallery.videoNotSupported: Your browser does not support video.

video1.longDesc: You suffer? Here's the solution: No Pain. Not for everyone, but it gives control and relief when needed.

video2.longDesc: Since discovering No Pain I test it on myself first. It allows color tattoos that heal properly — no pigment loss, no healing issues. Many artists use it for confident color work.

video3.longDesc: Adrián from Adsertattoos (Florida). With ~13 years of experience and a realism specialty, he uses staged applications (2–3 spots) for big pieces: move the cream as you progress, reapply, and keep the client comfortable for longer sessions.

video4.longDesc: Andrés (SupplyTattoo) explains three main benefits: lets people get tattooed despite fear, helps continue stalled projects, and assists clients with low pain tolerance. Apply 1–2 mm, cover 90–120 min for first use, effect lasts ~2–6 h; safe on open skin and doesn't affect pigments.

video5.longDesc: No Pain works across tattoo styles — from realism to color pieces — delivering comfort while preserving pigment and healing.

video6.longDesc: For a tattoo transformation like never before: No Pain brings a smooth session, long-lasting numbing and lets you focus only on the art. Expect up to several hours of comfort and unrivaled results.

video7.longDesc: Looking for effective cleanliness during tattooing? Green Soap by No Pain with chlorhexidine is ideal for skin disinfection. Dilute, apply, and tattoo with confidence. Professional results.

noPain.title: No Pain — FAQ
noPain.a1: No Pain is a topical anesthetic cream designed for tattoos and PMU.
noPain.a2: Effects can last several hours depending on use.
noPain.a3: Yes, when used as directed by professionals.
